subtitle: This mixture also makes a delicious stuffing for baked marrow.

method.text: Drain and rinse the beans. Cover with boiling water and cook, covered, for 10 min on 100% FULL power and a further 10 min on 50% MEDIUM power. Leave to stand.

In a large covered dish cook the onions and, garlic on 100% FULL power for 4-5 min, stirring once throughout. Add the tomato, orange rind, orange slices, seasoning and marjoram. Cover and cook for 10 min on 100% FULL power, stirring once.
Drain the aduki beans and add them to the sauce, mixing well. Heat, uncovered for 3-4 min on 50% MEDIUM power until hot through. Adjust the seasoning and serve immediately.
